name: meme-coin-automation-platform
description: Cost-optimized platform for automated meme coin creation and trading

scripts.install:services: cd services/social-monitor && npm install && cd ../sentiment-ai && npm install && cd ../token-creator && npm install && cd ../website-generator && npm install && cd ../trading-agent && npm install && cd ../cost-manager && npm install && cd ../../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:social-monitor" "npm run dev:sentiment-ai" "npm run dev:token-creator" "npm run dev:website-generator" "npm run dev:trading-agent" "npm run dev:cost-manager" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:services && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:services: cd services/social-monitor && npm run build && cd ../sentiment-ai && npm run build && cd ../token-creator && npm run build && cd ../website-generator && npm run build && cd ../trading-agent && npm run build && cd ../cost-manager && npm run build

author: Meme Coin Automation Team
